price: mereka tidak beriman kepadanya (Al-Qur`ān) dan sesungguhnya telah berlalu sunatullah  terhadap orang-orang dahulu  794 .
arabic: لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِهِۦ وَقَدۡ خَلَتۡ سُنَّةُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ
footnotes: 794.  Maksud sunatullah di sini ialah membinasakan orang-orang yang mendustakan rasul.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: lā yu'minūna bihi waqad khalat sunnatu al-awalīna
